subtitle: Look out for extra lean lamb steaks or escalopes for this recipe.

method.text: Mix marinade ingredients together in a bowl. Make 2 or 3 slashes in each lamb steak. Press some marinade into each cut. Place steaks in shallow non-metallic dish, with remaining marinade poured over.
Cover and leave to marinate for at least 1 days.
Lift steaks out of marinade and put onto grill pan. Grill for 12-15 min, turning over once half-way through cooking.
Cook couscous according to pack instructions.
Meanwhile, heat oil in frying pan and quickly fry mushrooms for 2 min, stirring. Add remaining marinade to mushrooms, reduce heat, and cook for 5 min.
Serve lamb with mushrooms and couscous.

title: Moroccan lamb steaks with mushrooms
